mapper.select:
SELECT
, ROUND(6378.138*2*asin(sqrt(pow(sin( (#{lat}*pi()/180-lat*pi()/180)/2),2) +cos(#{lat}*pi()/180)*cos(lat*pi()/180)* pow(sin( (#{lon}*pi()/180-lon*pi()/180)/2),2))) *1000) AS juli
from (select bc.id,substring_index(bsa.tree_id,',',1) province_id, substring_index(bc.tree_path,',',1) province_name, bc.`name` as course_name,bc.area_id,bc.lon,bc.lat,bc.address, bc.is_out_range,bc.out_range_time,bc.out_range_price,bc.is_tip,bc.wechat_tip from base_course bc left join base_sf_area bsa on bc.area_id = bsa.id where bc.is_delete =0 )a left join province on province.province_id = a.province_id where province.`status` ='1' or province.`status` is null order by province.sort_number

SELECT a.id, a.course_name, a.address, a.area_id, a.wechat_tip, a.is_out_range, a.out_range_time, a.out_range_price, a.is_tip
, ROUND(6378.138*2*asin(sqrt(pow(sin( (#{lat}*pi()/180-lat*pi()/180)/2),2) +cos(#{lat}*pi()/180)*cos(lat*pi()/180)* pow(sin( (#{lon}*pi()/180-lon*pi()/180)/2),2))) *1000) AS juli
from(select bc.id, substring_index(substring_index(bsa.tree_id,',',2),',',-1) city_id, substring_index(substring_index(bc.tree_path,',',2),',',-1)as city_name, bc.`name` as course_name,bc.area_id,bc.lon,bc.lat,bc.address, bc.is_out_range,bc.out_range_time,bc.out_range_price,bc.is_tip,bc.wechat_tip from base_course bc left join base_sf_area bsa on bc.area_id = bsa.id where bc.is_delete =0 )a
where a.city_id = #{id}
order by juli
